services.name: Income Certificate
services.description: A document that certifies an individual's income, issued by the government.
documents_needed: Proof of income (Salary slip, Income Tax Return)

services.name: Community / Caste Certificate
services.description: A certificate that states the community or caste of an individual, used for various legal and educational purposes.

services.name: Nativity Certificate
services.description: A document that certifies that an individual is a native of a particular state or country.

services.name: Non-Creamy Layer Certificate
services.description: A certificate that identifies an individual as belonging to the non-creamy layer of OBC, making them eligible for certain government benefits.

services.name: Possession Certificate
services.description: A document that certifies the possession of a property by an individual.

services.name: Possession & Non-Attachment Certificate
services.description: A certificate that indicates possession of property and absence of any attachments or encumbrances.

services.name: Family Membership Certificate
services.description: A document that certifies the members of a family, often required for various legal and government processes.
documents_needed: Identity proof of all family members

services.name: Legal Heir Certificate
services.description: A document that establishes the relationship of the heirs to the deceased, used in succession of property.

services.name: Certified Copy
services.description: A copy of a document that is certified as a true copy by a government authority.

services.name: Marriage / Birth / Death Registrations
services.description: Official registration of marriage, birth, or death with the government.

services.name: Encumbrance Certificate
services.description: A certificate that confirms that a property is free from any legal or monetary liabilities.

services.name: UDID Card
services.description: A unique disability ID card issued by the government, certifying a person's disability status.

services.name: Passport
services.description: A travel document issued by the government that certifies the identity and nationality of the holder for international travel.

services.name: Passport PCC
services.description: A Police Clearance Certificate (PCC) is issued to Indian passport holders who are looking to obtain a visa for certain countries.

services.name: PAN Card
services.description: A Permanent Account Number (PAN) card is a unique ten-digit alphanumeric identity issued by the Income Tax Department.

services.name: Voter ID Card
services.description: An identity card issued by the Election Commission of India that allows the holder to vote in elections.

services.name: Aadhaar Services
services.description: Services related to Aadhaar, such as new registration, updates, corrections, and mobile linking.
documents_needed: Date of birth proof (for new Aadhaar)

services.name: NORKA ID Card
services.description: An ID card issued by NORKA (Non-Resident Keralites Affairs) to provide various benefits and services to Keralites living abroad.

services.name: Udyog Aadhaar
services.description: A unique identification number provided by the Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) for small businesses.

services.name: KSEB Bill
services.description: Bill payment for Kerala State Electricity Board (KSEB) services.

services.name: Water Bill
services.description: Bill payment for water supply services.

services.name: Phone Bill
services.description: Bill payment for phone services.

services.name: Gas Mustering
services.description: Service related to gas connection verification and updates.

services.name: University Registrations and Fee Payments
services.description: Online registrations and fee payments for university courses.

services.name: Admission Online Registrations
services.description: Online registrations for academic course admissions.

services.name: Online Applications & Registrations
services.description: General online applications and registrations for various government services.

services.name: New Ration Card
services.description: Application for a new ration card, which provides subsidized food and fuel to eligible families.

services.name: Address Change in Ration Card
services.description: Request for changing the address on an existing ration card.

services.name: New Member Addition to Ration Card
services.description: Addition of a new family member to an existing ration card.

services.name: Member Deletion in Ration Card
services.description: Request for deletion of a family member from the ration card.
documents_needed: Identity proof of the member being deleted

services.name: NORKA Registration
services.description: Registration with NORKA (Non-Resident Keralites Affairs) for availing benefits and services.

services.name: NORKA Attestation
services.description: Attestation of documents for Keralites residing abroad, provided by NORKA.

services.name: NORKA Certificate
services.description: Certificate provided by NORKA for various official purposes.

services.name: Pension Application
services.description: Application for pension benefits.

services.name: Pension Continuation
services.description: Process for continuation of pension benefits after initial approval.

services.name: Pension Account Change
services.description: Request for changing the bank account details linked to pension benefits.

services.name: Vehicle Registration
services.description: Registration of a new or used vehicle with the transport department.

services.name: Transfer of Ownership
services.description: Transfer of vehicle ownership to another individual.
documents_needed: Identity proof of buyer and seller

services.name: Duplicate Registration Certificate
services.description: Issuance of a duplicate registration certificate in case of loss or damage.

services.name: NOC for Vehicle Transfer
services.description: No Objection Certificate (NOC) for transferring a vehicle to another state.

services.name: Vehicle Fitness Certificate
services.description: Certificate that confirms the roadworthiness of a vehicle.

services.name: Affidavit Preparation
services.description: Preparation of affidavits for various legal purposes.

services.name: Document Attestation
services.description: Attestation of various documents by authorized officials.

services.name: Notary Services
services.description: Notarization of documents by a legally authorized notary.

services.name: PF-UAN ACTIVATION
services.description: Activate your UAN (Universal Account Number) to access and manage your EPF (Employees' Provident Fund)

services.name: PF WITHDRAWAL
services.description: Employees can withdraw the funds after retirement, or partially in cases like unemployment, medical emergencies, or other specific reasons.

services.name: PF-EKYC
services.description: eKYC in PF is the process of linking your Aadhaar and other personal details with your Provident Fund account.

services.name: PF-MEMBER TRANSFER ACCOUNT
services.description: to move your Provident Fund balance from your old employer to your new one. This helps keep all your PF savings in one account when you change jobs.
